subject: We are your partner on GOAFFPRO platform
description_text:
Hello partner. We are your partner on GOAFFPRO platform. We are helping you
increase your revenue very well, but I cannot access your project. The
system has automatically rejected our account, making it impossible for us
to help you increase your revenue. We recommend that you reopen access or
agree to return so that we can access and help you increase your revenue.
My email: mcburrowsreali963@gmail.com. Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi Oanh,    Okay, we've reactivated your account and updated your payment account. Please be mindful of the code of conduct.

We thank you for your enthusiasm. We will become your reliable partner.
Thank you.

Vào Thứ 5, 4 thg 12, 2025 vào lúc 18:59 service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> đã viết:

> Hi Oanh,
>
> Okay, we've reactivated your account and updated your payment account.
> Please be mindful of the code of conduct.
>
>
>
